attributes.long-description:
Heaven’s Hitman is back…
With a Vengeance! Demonic powers are manifesting, fighting over the fates of imprisoned souls caught in Purgatory. Once again, Daniel Garner, the Curse of Darkness and the Toy of Light, has to fight his way past hordes of demons. Can he stop the powerful creatures that stand in his way?

A modern remake of two Classic shooters, Painkiller and Painkiller: Battle Out Of Hell
13 adrenaline filled levels, including 4 Boss levels Numerous Player vs. Player (PvP) and Player vs. Environment (PvE) Multiplayer modes
Coop, Survival, Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag
The soundtrack is forged in the same furnace as the weapons: Heavy Metal

1-2 players
110KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-8

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

© 2012 by Nordic Games GmbH, Austria. Developed by The Farm 51 Group SA, Poland. Produced, Published & Distributed by Nordic Games GmbH, Austria.
Painkiller is a trademark of Nordic Games Licensing AB, Sweden.
All other brands, product names and logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners.
All rights reserved.
